name: Sleight Of Hand
description:
Sleight of Hand:

A unique blend of the Stealth and Card Game genres.

Sneak around the level using the WASD keys, making sure to avoid enemies.
If enemies detect you, they'll chase and attack you.
They hit hard, so try not to avoid them!

You can play cards to give you helpful benefits, such as extra health or boosted speed.

There are coins scattered throughout the level. Collecting 3 coins will let you draw another card, so try and find them all.

Get to the end of the level to win.
